Trigger.name: Iron
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == "you" then system.hunting.vars.targetName = matches[3] system.hunting.vars.attacking = true end
if system.hunting.funcs.isHuntingTarget(matches[3]) then system.hunting.funcs.razeShield() end

regexCodeList.string: ^Directing the energy of iron, (you) engulf (.+)'s body with ashen flames, which burn \w+ skin with their frigid touch\.$
^(Ashen) flames engulf (.+)'s body, burning \w+ skin with their frigid touch\.$
